snippet: While cycling was at the center of the details released by the United States Anti-Doping Agency regarding its investigation of Lance Armstrong, his relatively new triathlon career also drew interest.
abstract: Lance Armstrong, who has been prohibited by the World Triathlon Corporation from competing in the Ironman competition because of continuing doping investigation, draws mixed reception from the triathlon community.
lead_paragraph: While cycling was at the center of the details released by the United States Anti-Doping Agency regarding its investigation of Lance Armstrong, his relatively new triathlon career also drew interest.

headline.seo: Lance Armstrong Draws Mixed Reception From Triathlon Community
headline.main: Armstrong Finds a Mixed Reception in Triathlon
headline.print_headline: Armstrong Finds a Mixed Reception in Triathlon
